org.silex.runtime.mouse.as3.Mouse

type
class
extends
org.silex.runtime.mouse.base.MouseBase
This is the flash AVM2 implementation of the mouse event manager. Listens to flash native mouse event on the provided flash display object.

Constructor

new(nativeReference : org.silex.runtime.nativeReference.NativeReference)
class constructor.

inherited from org.silex.runtime.mouse.base.MouseBase
The callback to call when the native reference is clicked

inherited from org.silex.runtime.mouse.base.MouseBase
The callback to call when the mouse move while over the native reference

inherited from org.silex.runtime.mouse.base.MouseBase
The callback to call when the native reference is moused out

inherited from org.silex.runtime.mouse.base.MouseBase
the callback to call when the native reference is hovered

inherited from org.silex.runtime.mouse.base.MouseBase
